She looks at him and smiles a little. "That's alright.  I know it's 
not what most bots would call normal."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow <twb176@y...> wrote:
> ::WindRider::
> WindRider looked at Battera and smiled. "You know,
> you're rather unusual. I've never heard of a Predacon
> who was interested in peace negotiations before."He
> instantly felt like that was the wrong to say. "I'm
> sorry", he said. "That came out wrong. I hope I didn't
> offend you."
